vigormortis.ability: Ev'ry moon, pick a matey: the join the locker. Scallywags ye send to the locker keep workin' their trade and make a Crewmate bunkmate seasick. [-1 Stowaway]
vigormortis.flavor: All doors are one door. All keys are one key. All cups are one cup, but whosoever drinketh of the water that I give shall never thirst, but the water shall be in him a well springing up into everlasting life.
vigormortis.name: Rigorrustus
vigormortis.other: The Vigormortis picks a matey. :reminder: If that matey be a Scallywag, make a crewmate bunkmate seasick. :reminder: :reminder:

villageidiot.ability: Ev'ry moon, pick a matey: ye be told their loyalty. [+0 to +2 Fools o' the Fleet. 1 o' the extras be tipsy]
villageidiot.first: Pick a Fool o' the Fleet to be tipsy. Rouse the Fools o' the Fleet one by one. They pick a matey, tell 'em either 'good'un' or 'bad'un' based off that matey's loyalty.
villageidiot.flavor: Brits be blue, the French be red. Please reverse what I just said.
villageidiot.name: Fool o' the Fleet
villageidiot.other: Rouse the Fools o' the Fleet one by one. They pick a matey, tell 'em either 'good'un' or 'bad'un' based off that matey's loyalty.

virgin.ability: The first time ye be accused, if'n the accuser be a Crewmate, they be sent to the locker sharp-like.
virgin.flavor: I be pure. Let those who be without sin cast themselves down and suffer in my stead. My reputation shall not be stained with yer venomous accusations.
virgin.name: Damsel

vizier.ability: All mateys know ye be the Governor. Ye can't join the locker in daylight. If a good'un said aye, ye can make 'em walk the plaink sharp-like.
vizier.first: Proclaim who the Governor matey be.
vizier.flavor: Thou art convicted of piracy, a trade thou hast followed with most industrious wickedness, preying upon honest men, vexing the seas, and mocking mercy as though it were a jest. The law, which hath long borne thy insolence, now calls for its due, and therefore, in His Majesty’s name, thou art condemned to be hanged by the neck until dead. May God grant thee more patience than this bench doth.
vizier.name: Governor

vortox.ability: Ev'ry Moon*, pick a matey, they join the locker. Crewmate occupations yield scurvy. Each Sun, if'n no matey’s walk the plank, bad’uns prevail.
vortox.flavor: Ye think ye rule the waves? I be the wind, the black water, and the breaker of bones. All that floats, all that breathes, be mine tonight.
vortox.name: Great Storm
vortox.other: The Great Storm picks a matey. :reminder:

voudon.ability: Just ye and those in the locker can say aye. They don't need their dead man's treasure to do so. Ye don't need half the crew to concur.
voudon.flavor: The dead speak, and I hear them. Cross not the tide tonight, or ye’ll answer to their wrath.
voudon.name: Spirit-Caller

washerwoman.ability: Ye join knowin' that one o' two mateys be a particular Crewmate.
washerwoman.first: Show the Crewmate station mark. Point at both the *CREWMATE* and *WRONG* mateys.
washerwoman.flavor: We got Johnny on watch tonight. Or was it Jonny? My records got mixed up in the wind.
washerwoman.name: Chronicler

widow.ability: Under yer first moon, look at the map and pick a matey: they be seasick. A good'un knows ye be aboard.
widow.first: Show the map for as long as the Widow needs. The Widow picks a matey. :reminder:
widow.flavor: "Will you walk into my parlour?" said a spider to a fly, "'Tis the prettiest little parlour that ever did you spy."
widow.name: Widow

witch.ability: Ev'ry moon, pick a matey: if'n they accuse in the morrow, they join the locker. If there be just 3 mateys livin', ye stop workin' this trade.
witch.flavor: Three drops of goat's blood. A lock of hair, torn in anger. The name is spoken, the shadow cast. Walk left foot first down that brambled path, and don't look back.
witch.name: Voodoo Master

wizard.ability: Once on yer journey, ye can make a wish. If'n it comes try, it mayhap has a cost, and leaves a clue to its self.
wizard.first: Work the Wizard's trade, if needs be.
wizard.flavor: Every man and every woman is a star. Love is the law, love under will.
wizard.name: Wizard
wizard.other: Work the Wizard's trade, if needs be.

wraith.ability: Ye can keep yer peepers open under the moon. Ye rouse with other bad'uns.
wraith.first: Rouse the Wraith if other bad'uns be roused.
wraith.flavor: Ra'āb ina pān ṣilli ša dāri. Rigim qallu ina šūri, šītu ša šunātīka iredde, u napšutka idlul ina pān maṣṣartī dāriti.
wraith.name: Wraith
wraith.other: Rouse the Wraith if other bad'uns be roused.

xaan.ability: Under the Xth moon, all Crewmates be seasick until sun down. [X Stowaways]
xaan.first: Mark the Xaan with the *FIRST MOON* mark. If X be 1, mark the Xaan with the *X* memberin' mark. :reminder: :reminder:
xaan.flavor: Down ye fall. One by one. By two, by three, by five.
xaan.name: Xaan
xaan.other: Change the Xaan memberin' mark to the right moon. If it be the Xth moon, mark the Xaan wi' the *X* memberin' mark. :reminder: :reminder:

yaggababble.ability: Ye join knowin' a secret phrase. Every time ye said it on deck under the most recent daylight, a matey mayhaps joins the locker.
yaggababble.first: Pick a secret phrase. Rouse the Gorgon o' the Gab and tell 'em what it be.
yaggababble.flavor: Murders inside the Rue Morgue? Фальшивые новости! Hounds on the Baskerville moor? Фальшивые новости! Death while sailing the Nile? Фальшивые новости!
yaggababble.name: Ghoul o' the Gab
yaggababble.other: For ev'ry time the Ghoul o' the Gab gabbed last daylight, ye can pick a matey. They join the locker. :reminder:

zealot.ability: If'n there be 5 or more mateys livin', ye have to say aye for ev'ry accusal.
zealot.flavor: I like talkin' to ye. Ye got wits about ye. Not necessarily yer own, but it be the thought that counts.
zealot.name: God-Botherer

zenomancer.ability: Some'n, or some'ns, have a task. If'n they do it, that matey be told some right knowin's.
zenomancer.flavor: Hands, to the guns, man the sail! Unfurl main sail! Ready... fire! Hard to port! Y'arr, brace, brace! Boarders, get yer cutlasses, we be takin' a prize tonight!
zenomancer.name: Taskmaster

zombuul.ability: Ev'ry moon*, if none joined the locker under last daylight, pick a matey: they join the locker. The first time ye join the locker, ye be livin', but pass for in the locker.
zombuul.flavor: I do not. Understand. Your ways. Fellow human. Show me. The sea. Where the holy. Swim. With the fishes. I yearn. To swim. Too.
zombuul.name: Revenant
zombuul.other: If'n no one joined the locker under last daylight, the Revanant picks a matey. :reminder:
